summary: One \"Fort\" Ive made for you to win items :)
descriptionHtml:
Update 1.1 is coming soon.. 

Story :

This Fortress is the only building left in this lost city.. (If you want you can check underwater there are buildings..)
Some bandits have captured it for many years...
Cool info: There is hidden one Daedric Sword 
And on the building there are armors ( Weapons ) Check everywhere:)
Also try the horses if you dont have one :) (i use the ghost horse)

How to install : 
Drop the file into your Data Folder

If you get any bugg tell me so i try fix it :) (im solo thats why i wont be so sure about fixing it or not )
My other mods :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33529 - Ruins At Riverwood ( My First Mod)
author: Sasisma
